description: This table contains data on the disciplines associated with the goals.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the goal record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The DTE contact date for the goal record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: DISC_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the discipline to be responsible for this goal.

columns.name: DISC_TYPE_ID_DISC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the discipline record.
